pages.text: Smoked Herb Blends are basically just normal Herb Blends, but the effect potency and duration are buffed.
The conjuration to create a $(t:Provides blindness to the targeted player)Smoked Shaded Herb Blend$() is shown above.
The conjuration to create a $(t:Sets the target on fire)Smoked Incinerating Herb Blend$() is shown above.
The conjuration to create a $(t:Provides haste to the targeted player)Smoked Dashing Herb Blend$() is shown above.
The conjuration to create a $(t:Provides mining fatigue to the targeted player)Smoked Hindering Herb Blend$() is shown above.
The conjuration to create a $(t:Provides night vision to the targeted player)Smoked Observing Herb Blend$() is shown above.
The conjuration to create a $(t:Provides poison to the targeted player)Smoked Virulent Herb Blend$() is shown above.
The conjuration to create a $(t:Provides regeneration to the targeted player)Smoked Regenerative Herb Blend$() is shown above.
The conjuration to create a $(t:Provides regeneration and slowness to the targeted player)Smoked Conflicting Herb Blend$() is shown above.
The conjuration to create a $(t:Provides regeneration, speed, and weakness to the targeted player)Smoked Alternative Herb Blend$() is shown above.
The conjuration to create a $(t:Provides slowness to the targeted player)Smoked Sedating Herb Blend$() is shown above.
The conjuration to create a $(t:Provides speed to the targeted player)Smoked Acceleration Herb Blend$() is shown above.
The conjuration to create a $(t:Provides weakness to the targeted player)Smoked Diminished Herb Blend$() is shown above.
The conjuration to create a $(t:Provides wither to the targeted player)Smoked Decaying Herb Blend$() is shown above.
These entries may also be useful in your studies.
